questions.question_text: Which two devices or applications support call preservation? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
The following devices and applications support call preservation. If both parties connect through one of the
following devices, Cisco Unified Communications Manager maintains call preservation:
• Cisco Unified IP Phones
• SIP trunks
• Software conference bridge
• Software MTP
The following devices and applications do not support call preservation:
• Annunciator
• H.323 endpoints such as NetMeeting or third-party H.323 endpoints
• CTI applications
• TAPI applications
• JTAPI applications

questions.question_text: Which two Cisco Unified Communications Manager configuration sections are used to configure the media DSCP values for video calls? (Choose two.)

An engineer is configuring an H.323 endpoint on VCS and wants to prevent H.323 endpoints from registering automatically. To which menu navigation sequence
VCS must the engineer navigate to accomplish that goal?

discussion.content:
Correct Answer: D
“Auto Discover = Off” simply stops the VCS responding to multicast Gatekeeper discovery requests. If an endpoint is configured in the normal way (i.e. with the IP or FQDN of the VCS), it will still register ‘automatically’.

choices.B: Configuration > Registration > Allow List > Auto Discovery Off
choices.D: Configuration > Protocols > H.323 > Auto Discover Off D
choices.A: Configuration > Registration > Allow List > Auto Registration Off
choices.C: Configuration > Protocols > H.323 > Auto Registration Off

choices.D: Send any SIP URI with the domain portion that matches any other domain to Expressway-E.
choices.B: Send any SIP URI with the domain portion that matches the domain of the local company to the Expressway-C cluster.
choices.C: Use a SIP Route Pattern set to "*".
choices.E: Send any SIP URI with the domain portion that matches the domain of the local company to Cisco Unified Communications Manager. DE
choices.A: Send any SIP URI with the domain portion that matches any other domain to the DNS Zone that is used for DNS SRV resolution.

questions.question_text: Which two rules are applied to the Expressway-C when configuring business-to-business communications? (Choose two.)

choices.C: System > Service Parameters > Cisco Directory Number Alias Lookup
